title: narayaNa muraa naraka
sahitya:
nArAyaNamurA naraka vidAraNa nAradanuta caranNA sUrI jana 
caraNa shubha guNAbharaNa ghOra bhavataraNa krUra mada vAraNa

caraNam 1

 caNDa bhAnukula maNDa nadhrta kOdaNDa bAhu daNDA 
kuNDala maNDita daNDa yugaLa vEdaNDa pAla puNDarIka lOcana
 
caraNam 2

 sanga rahita muni pungava nijAnta ranga kamala bhrngA 
angajAyuta nipAnga hara dhanurbhanga vihanga turanga shubhAnga
 
caraNam 3

 rAmacandrapuradhA vinuta sutrAma sArvabhaumA 
kAma vairinuta nAmayAmbudhi sOma bhIma rAmadAsa pAlana
